thread.title: Gas leak forces Bedford High to cancel classes
thread.title_full: Gas leak forces Bedford High to cancel classes

author: 13abc
title: Gas leak forces Bedford High to cancel classes
text:
An early morning gas leak has canceled classes at Bedford High School in Monroe County. The district's superintendent, Mark Kleinhans, says just before 7:00 am students and staff alerted firefighters after a strong smell of natural gas could be detected in the north part of the building. Students and staff have been evacuated to the middle school.
Kleinhaus says parents can pick up their children in the middle school gym. Students that drive have been sent home. Once bus drivers drop off elementary students, they will pick up the high school students and take them home.
Firefighters are on the scene. The superintendent says the gas has been turned off. Columbia gas is investigating the leak.
Stay with 13abc online and on-air for updates.
